item.title: A whale bought an additional 5553 ETH within 40 minutes, accumulating a total of 18,447 ETH since August 11th.
item.description: On September 2nd, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, a whale beginning with 0x4ED0 has made another purchase of 5553 ETH within the past 40 minutes, with an approximate value of $24.44 million. Since August 11th, this whale has bought a total of 18,447 ETH at an average price of $4417 (amounting to approximately $81.5 million), and also purchased 1357 WBTC at an average price of $117,547 (valued at approximately $160 million). Subsequently, these assets were deposited into Aave and a loan of 114.2 million USDT was obtained.

item.title: Quack AI: Q Airdrop Claiming Now Open
item.description: On September 2nd, according to an official announcement by Quack AI, the Q airdrop distribution has now become available for claiming. Users can access the relevant portal to check their status, view their allocation, and follow the procedures to claim or transfer the airdrop.

item.title: Binance Alpha's latest Quack AI (Q) Airdrop Single Ticket Reward is approximately $64
item.description: On September 2nd, based on market data, Quack AI (Q) has been listed on Binance Alpha. Currently, it is priced at $0.010817. It has a market capitalization of $17.5 million on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC). Each eligible user can receive an airdrop of 6000 Q tokens. The estimated single airdrop reward at the current price is approximately $64.9.

item.title: A whale today market sold all WBTC acquired through leverage trading and swapped it for 15,083 ETH.
item.description: On September 2nd, according to Ember Monitor, a whale purchased 602.8 WBTC ($66.9 million) through leverage trading 6 days prior at a price of $110,993. Three hours ago today, this whale sold all 602.8 WBTC and acquired 15,083 ETH.Currently, the whale holds 16,909 ETH ($73.84 million), with an approximate cost of $4,441.

item.title: Falcon Finance Update: USDf Reserve Full Asset Breakdown
item.description: On September 2nd, Falcon Finance updated the comprehensive asset details of USDf on its official website. The figures indicate that 96.3% of the reserve assets in USDf consist of major assets like BTC and stablecoins, which have deep market liquidity and high exchange coverage.As of the moment of writing, the total value of the reserve assets of USDf is 1.29 billion US dollars, and the asset backing ratio is 105.09%.

item.title: Bybit has recently added two MNT trading pairs, aiming to provide users with more trading options and liquidity.
item.description: On September 2nd, according to an official announcement, Bybit has added two new MNT trading pairs today. These pairs are ETH/MNT and MNT/USDE. The announcement stated that this is to offer users more trading options and liquidity.On August 29th, Bybit released the "Mantle Ã— Bybit Roadmap" plan. In this plan, MNT will support payment platform transaction fees and enjoy discounts, bringing a comprehensive upgrade to its utility in various scenarios.

item.title: OKX will list USD1 Spot Trading
item.description: September 2nd. According to an official announcement, OKX will list USD1 Spot Trading. The USD1/USDT spot trading will commence on September 2, 2025, at 7:00 PM (UTC+8).

item.title: Hyperliquid's August Monthly Revenue Exceeds $100 Million, Setting a Historic Record
item.description: On September 2nd, according to the data from DefiLlama, the August revenue of Hyperliquid reached $106 million, hitting a monthly all-time high, which is a 23% increase from the $86.6 million in July. This is attributed to the nearly $400 billion perpetual contract trading volume of the platform in August.

item.title: European Securities and Markets Authority: Security Tokenization may mislead investors as they do not provide the same shareholder rights as direct ownership
item.description: On September 2nd, Natasha Cazenave, the Executive Director of the European Securities and Markets Authority (ESMA), cautioned that Tokenized Stocks might mislead investors as they do not convey the same shareholder rights as direct ownership.

item.title: Linea Network's DeFi TVL Reaches an All-Time High, With a 60.30% Increase in the Past Week
item.description: On September 2nd, according to the data from DefiLlama, the DeFi TVL of the Linea Network has reached a new record high. It currently stands at $8.9294 billion, with a weekly growth rate of 60.30%.
